name: RegESM
body:
# RegESM - **Reg**ional **E**arth **S**ystem **M**odel

## Components

* ATM: [RegCM](http://gforge.ictp.it/gf/project/regcm/) (4.3.5.6)
* OCN: [ROMS](http://www.myroms.org) (3.5)
* RTM: [HD]( http://www.mpimet.mpg.de/en/science/the-land-in-the-earth-system/terrestrial-hydrology/hd-model.html) (1.0.2) for license go [here](http://www.mpimet.mpg.de/en/science/models/model-distribution.html)

## Prerequisites

* RegESM itself
* Earth System Modeling Framework ([ESMF](http://www.earthsystemmodeling.org), >= 6.2.0 beta 15) Library
* Model Components (patched and installed with coupling support)
 
## Design
![Components of the RegESM](http://www.be.itu.edu.tr/~u.utku.turuncoglu/regesm.gif)
![Run sequence of the components - fast vs. slow processes](http://www.be.itu.edu.tr/~u.utku.turuncoglu/runSeq.gif)
